Create a chat client for Poppy

poppy_chat.Rd

Thin wrapper around ellmer::chat_openai() configured for the Poppy endpoint.

Usage

poppy_chat(
  model = "Anthropic Claude Sonnet 4.5",
  api_key = Sys.getenv("POPPY_API_KEY"),
  ...
)

Arguments

model

Model name passed to ellmer::chat_openai(). Defaults to "Anthropic Claude Sonnet 4.5". To see available models, use poppy_models.

api_key

API key for Poppy. Defaults to Sys.getenv("POPPY_API_KEY").

...

Additional arguments forwarded to ellmer::chat_openai().

Value

An ellmer chat client.

See also

ellmer::chat_openai() for full argument and functionality details.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
llm <- poppy_chat()
llm$chat("Hi, who are you?")
} # }
